<body class=3D'hmmessage'><div dir=3D'ltr'>PENTANGLE ARTS presents...<br>si=
nger/songwriter<br>Hayley Reardon<br>Friday, April 24th <br>7:00 pm<br>Arti=
sTree<strong></strong><br>Free.&nbsp; Suggested donation ($10) gratefully a=
ccepted.<BR><br><BR>
<strong><a href=3D"http://www.hayleyreardon.com/" target=3D"_blank">Hayley =
Reardon</a></strong>&nbsp; is noted for her thoughtful, vivid songwriting a=
nd engaging stage=20
performance. She has spent the past five years sharing the stage with
 acts like Tom Rush, Peter Yarrow, Buskin &amp; Batteau, Christine=20
Lavin, and opening for the likes of Lori McKenna, Mark Erelli, and Catie
 Curtis. <br><BR><br><BR>In 2012, The Boston Globe Magazine named her a "Bo=
stonian of the Year"=20
for both her music and her message of teen=20
empowerment. The feature article characterized her as =93a confident,=20
radiant teenage singer/songwriter who is helping to pen the next chapter
 of the Boston folk scene=85.while Reardon is rapidly making a name for=20
herself under the stage lights, it could be said that she=92s having a=20
bigger impact on her peers across the country as an effective=20
teen-to-teen ambassador, sought after by schools nationwide.=94<BR><br><fon=
t style=3D"" face=3D"Calibri"><i>---<br>Pentangle Arts Council<br>31 The Gr=
een<br>Woodstock, VT 05091<br>802-457-3981</i></font><font style=3D"" face=
